BALL::SolventPredicate

BALL::SolventPredicate Class Reference

#include <BALL/KERNEL/standardPredicates.h>

Inheritance diagram for BALL::SolventPredicate:

List of all members.


Public Member Functions

virtual bool operator() (const Atom &atom) const

Detailed Description

Predicate indicating solvent atoms. Returns true, if the atom belongs to a solvent molecule. This predicate is true if the atom is contained in a molecule with the property Molecule::IS_SOLVENT set. This is usually the case for solvents added automatically by a force field.

See also:
PeriodicBoundary::addSolvent
